resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Get one now!
Already a user? Sign in now!
Hello! Is this the first time you\'re using Freedomap? Let us walk you through a tutorial on the basic functions in this app.

Freedomap is a map that is created and made interesting by contributions from you and other users. You can pinpoint interesting spots, funny spots, good deals, events, hangouts, good mushroom areas. Basically whatever you want. Your imagination is the limit!

You pinpoint a location by pressing your finger at it for 3 seconds. A dialog is shown where you can enter information such as title, description, photo and hashtags to describe your location. If you want it to be an event, you can set a time interval for it.
If you want to filter shown locations you can search and add hashtags in the top menu. The map will thereafter only show those locations that are connected to these hashtags.
If you want to see more information about a location you can press it and a popup will appear with all available information.
Now you are ready to start using Freedomap! Remember that this app is made great by you and your contribution!
You have to set a title to continue
Your title may only contain 40 characters!
Your title have to consist of at least two characters!
Your description may only contain 400 characters!
Your end date is previous to your start date!
Your end time is previous to your start time!
Please finish filling in the start/end times/dates.
You can not set a starting date before the current day!
You can not set a starting time before the current time!
You need to add at least one tag!
You have failed to register, please try again
You have failed to login, please try again
You have to login or register to continue!
You are too far away from this event to check in
You may not add this tag!
